text: The President of the Hellenic Republic (, Próedros ti̱s Elli̱nikí̱s Di̱mokratías) is the head of state of Greece. The President is elected by the Hellenic Parliament. His role is mostly ceremonial since the 1986 constitutional reform. The office was formally established by the Constitution of Greece in 1975. The current president, since 2025,KonstantinosTasoulas , serving her first term in office. She is also the first female president. ==Oath of office== Before taking office, the President must recite an oath before Parliament: ==List of presidents of the Third Republic== President President President Term of office Term of office Term of office Political party No. Portrait Name Took office Left office Time in office Political party 1 Michail Stasinopoulos (1903–2002) 18 December 1974 19 July 1975 New Democracy 1 Michail Stasinopoulos (1903–2002) 2 Konstantinos Tsatsos (1899–1987) 19 July 1975 10 May 1980 New Democracy 2 Konstantinos Tsatsos (1899–1987) 3 Konstantinos Karamanlis (1907–1998) 10 May 1980 10 March 1985 (resigned.)
